pkgmetadata.longdescription: pfstools - a set of programs for reading, writing, manipulating and viewing high-dynamic range (HDR) images and video frames. pfscalibration - photometric calibration of cameras and HDR images from multiple exposures. pfstmo - tone mapping operators.
